title: Bug Report: NameError: name 'TestElectraForSequenceClassification' is not defined
body:
## Introduction

* paddle version: `2.2.0`
* macos
* python3.9
* ide: vscode
* test plugin: [Python Test Explorer for Visual Studio Code](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=LittleFoxTeam.vscode-python-test-adapter)

## Error Message

```shell
Failed to import test module: transformers.gpt.test_modeling
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/wj-Mcat/miniconda3/envs/paddle/lib/python3.9/unittest/loader.py", line 436, in _find_test_path
    module = self._get_module_from_name(name)
  File "/home/wj-Mcat/miniconda3/envs/paddle/lib/python3.9/unittest/loader.py", line 377, in _get_module_from_name
    __import__(name)
  File "/home/wj-Mcat/projects/paddle/PaddleNLP/tests/transformers/gpt/test_modeling.py", line 84, in <module>
    class TestGPTForTokenClassification(TestElectraForSequenceClassification):
NameError: name 'TestElectraForSequenceClassification' is not defined
```
## Reproduce

This is the abvious error which does't need to reproduce it: there is no `TestElectraForSequenceClassification` importing in `tests/transformers/gpt/test_modeling.py` file.  So it throws the NameError issue in testing panel.  

Although there is no error been thrown at runtime, but it's also a linting error which should be fixed. How do you think about it ?

title: Fix FasterGeneration(FasterEncoder) when loading a lib without fusion_encoder to use FasterEncoder
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
Bug fixes

### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
APIs

### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
Fix FasterGeneration(FasterEncoder) when load a lib without fusion_encoder to use FasterEncoder. 

After loading a custom op lib in `enable_faster_encoder()`, the original `TransformerEncoder`'s `forward` will be replaced by the faster version. 
However, if there is no `fusion_encoder` in the lib, the replacement cannot be undo.

if __name__ == '__main__':

    print(len(two_list))
    flags = ["********","############"]
    for query_text in two_list:
        query_array = query_text.split(',')
        #print(query_text)
        '''
                    启动 10个线程访问
        '''
        for i in range(10):
            #threadid=random.randint(0,9)
            targetid = random.randint(0,len(two_list))
            targetText = two_list[targetid]
            '''
                               线程里面调用语义索引模型来计算相似度(model_state.pdparams),判断两文本相似度
            '''
            thread1 = myThread(i,"Thread-"+str(targetid),query_array[0],targetText)
            thread1.start()
        #time.sleep(0.1) 
    print('退出主线程')

title: ernie-1.0 分布式训练策略、fleet相关问题求助。
body:
您好，有几个sharding和fleet相关问题想请教，望指点一二，感激不尽！
1、请问fleet.worker_num和fleet.worker_index分别指的是什么呢？是总gpu个数和当前gpu索引还是总机器数和当前机器的索引呢？
2、请问在分布式训练中，当pp和mp均设置为1，只考虑dp和sharding时，是否是将全量数据先分成dp_num份放入不同主机，再将不同主机当中的数据分成sharding_num份，放入同一个主机下的不同显卡呢？倘若采用单机多卡的话，数据将如何分配？
3、在数据采样时，通过data_info.rank的不同，将数据采样生成data_info.size生成个生成器放入不同gpu，其中data_info.rank和dp_rank\sharding_rank相关，请问dp_rank， sharding_rank又和device_rank(fleet.worker_index)相关，请问每次训练，调用静态图的时候fleet.worker_index会交替变化吗？徘徊于各个gpu之间？通过fleet.worker_index来反推数据应该储存在哪一块显卡上，请问这个逻辑成立吗？
4、请问global_batch_size和micro_batch_size之间的关系是什么呢？若只考虑sharding和dp，是否意味着num_sharding * num_dp * micro_batch_size应该等于global_batch_size？
5、请问run_static.sh中num_workers的设定又有什么含义，和fleet.worker_num有何区别和联系呢？
6、我们在得到num_index后，在定义dataloader的时候，会根据num_index不同，把数据采样成num_index份，再放入不同卡，我想问的是这个fleet.num_index每次会变化吗？我看代码没有找到它变化的地方，如果是2卡训练的话，我理解它应该是0，1交替变化的，这样才能分别采样数据，放入不同的卡，这个num_index是每次跑静态图都会变吗，还是什么原理？

问题比较多，给您添麻烦了，期待您的指教，感谢！

title: PaddleNLP/examples/model_compression/ofa/run_glue_ofa.py / 代码疑问以及训练结果没有达到压缩模型效果
body:
for width_mult in args.width_mult_list:
    # Step8: Broadcast supernet config from width_mult,
    # and use this config in supernet training.
    net_config = utils.dynabert_config(ofa_model, width_mult)
    ofa_model.set_net_config(net_config)
    logits, teacher_logits = ofa_model(
        input_ids, segment_ids, attention_mask=[None, None])
    rep_loss = ofa_model.calc_distill_loss()
    if args.task_name == 'sts-b':
        logit_loss = paddle.zeros(shape=[1], dtype='float32')
    else:
        logit_loss = soft_cross_entropy(logits,
                                        teacher_logits.detach())
    loss = rep_loss + args.lambda_logit * logit_loss
    loss.backward()
optimizer.step()
lr_scheduler.step()
optimizer.clear_grad()

这上面是每种子网络都计算损失，然后这个损失把梯度计算出来后没有更新梯度，到for循环结束，梯度更新，这个更新的梯度是以所有子网络累计的梯度来更新吗？这么做的原因是什么？


for idx, width_mult in enumerate(args.width_mult_list):
    net_config = utils.dynabert_config(ofa_model, width_mult)
    ofa_model.set_net_config(net_config)
    tic_eval = time.time()
    if args.task_name == "mnli":
        acc = evaluate(ofa_model, criterion, metric,
                       dev_data_loader_matched, width_mult)
        evaluate(ofa_model, criterion, metric,
                 dev_data_loader_mismatched, width_mult)
        print("eval done total : %s s" %
              (time.time() - tic_eval))
    else:
        eval_result, eval_loss = evaluate(ofa_model, criterion, metric, dev_data_loader, width_mult)
        print("eval done total : %s s" %
              (time.time() - tic_eval))

    if paddle.distributed.get_rank() == 0:
        best_eval_result = eval_result
        # output_dir = args.output_dir
        output_dir = os.path.join(args.output_dir, "model_%d" % global_step)
        if not os.path.exists(output_dir):
            os.makedirs(output_dir)
        # need better way to get inner model of DataParallel
        model_to_save = model._layers if isinstance(
            model, paddle.DataParallel) else model
        model_to_save.save_pretrained(output_dir)
        tokenizer.save_pretrained(output_dir)

每个子网络都会去评估损失，然后保存模型，那保存的模型是最优子网络的模型参数吗？这里面怎么判断的呢，感觉好像是保存了最后一个子网络的模型参数？


源代码原封不动，训练完成后，相比之前的教师模型并没有达到压缩效果都是400多M这是什么原因？

model代码：
```
class QAModel(ErnieDocPretrainedModel):
    base_model_prefix = "ernie_doc"
    def __init__(self, ernie_doc):
        super(QAModel, self).__init__()
        self.ernie_doc = ernie_doc
        self.dropout = nn.Dropout(self.ernie_doc.config["hidden_dropout_prob"])
        self.linear = nn.Linear(self.ernie_doc.config["hidden_size"], 2)
        self.apply(self.init_weights)

    def forward(self, input_ids, token_type_ids, attention_mask, position_ids, memories=None, start_label=None,
                end_label=None):
        if  memories is None:
            memories = [paddle.zeros([input_ids.shape[0], 128, 768], dtype="float32") for _ in range(12)]
        sequence_output, _, _ = self.ernie_doc(input_ids, memories, token_type_ids, position_ids, attention_mask)
        sequence_output = self.dropout(sequence_output)
        logits = self.linear(sequence_output)
        start_logits, end_logits = paddle.transpose(logits, perm=[2, 0, 1])
        pred_start_label, pred_end_label = paddle.argmax(start_logits, axis=-1), paddle.argmax(end_logits, axis=-1)
        outputs = (start_logits, end_logits, pred_start_label, pred_end_label)
        if start_label is not None and end_label is not None:
            start_position = paddle.unsqueeze(start_label, axis=-1)
            end_position = paddle.unsqueeze(end_label, axis=-1)
            start_loss = paddle.nn.functional.cross_entropy(
                input=start_logits, label=start_position)
            end_loss = paddle.nn.functional.cross_entropy(
                input=end_logits, label=end_position)
            loss = (start_loss + end_loss) / 2
            outputs = (loss,) + outputs
        return outputs
```

转onnx代码：
```
def save_onnx_model(args):
    model = QAModel.from_pretrained(args.model_path)
    model.eval()

    input_ids = paddle.static.InputSpec([1, args.max_len, 1], "int64", "input_ids")
    attention_mask = paddle.static.InputSpec([1, args.max_len, 1], "float32", "attention_mask")
    token_type_ids = paddle.static.InputSpec([1, args.max_len, 1], "int64", "token_type_ids")
    position_ids = paddle.static.InputSpec([1, args.max_len +args.max_len+args.memory_len, 1], "int64", "position_ids")
    paddle.onnx.export(model, args.onnx_model_path,
                       input_spec=[input_ids, token_type_ids, attention_mask, position_ids], opset_version=10)

    onnx_model = onnx.load(args.onnx_model_path + ".onnx")
    onnx.checker.check_model(onnx_model)
```

```

    """设置训练模型所需参数"""

    parser.add_argument('--max_query_len', type=int, default=128, help='')
    parser.add_argument('--n_best_size', type=int, default=5, help='')
    parser.add_argument('--max_answer_length', type=int, default=128, help='')
    parser.add_argument('--memory_len', default=128, type=int, help='')
    parser.add_argument('--model_path', default="ernie-doc/", type=str, help='')
    parser.add_argument('--onnx_model_path', default="output_dir/checkpoint_onnx/model", type=str, help='')
    parser.add_argument('--static_model_path', default="output_dir/checkpoint_static/model", type=str, help='')
    parser.add_argument('--use_mkldnn', type=bool, default=True, help='')
    return parser.parse_args()


if __name__ == '__main__':
    args = set_args()
    save_onnx_model(args)
```

title: 【论文复现】paddlenlp.transformers.BertModel中的attention_mask
body:
文档中是这么说的：
*It is a tensor with shape broadcasted to `[batch_size, num_attention_heads, sequence_length, sequence_length]`. Defaults to `None`, which means nothing needed to be prevented attention to.*

看完这句话以为输入维度要 `[batch_size, num_attention_heads, sequence_length, sequence_length]`才行。

然而看了源码发现如果不给出`attention_mask`，那么模型初始化的`attention_mask`维度是`[batch_size, 1, 1, sequence_length]`，如下面代码：

```
if attention_mask is None:
    attention_mask = paddle.unsqueeze(
        (input_ids == self.pad_token_id
         ).astype(self.pooler.dense.weight.dtype) * -1e9,
        axis=[1, 2])
```

经过自己测试发现，输入的attention_mask维度为`[batch_size, 1, 1, sequence_length]`，没有问题。

所以是文档写错了？？？

title: [NPU] npu support modification for bert and ernie-1.0

### PR types
Others

### PR changes
Others

### Description
1. Bert and ernie-1.0 support NPU device
2. When compiled with npu, cumsum use int32 because CANN operator doesn't support int64_t.
